casebody.data:
[The State ex rel.] Piphus et al. v. Blum, Chief, et al.

[Cite as Piphus v. Blum (1995), 72 Ohio St.3d 1211.]

(No. 94-1804 Submitted April 4, 1995 Decided May 10, 1995.) Lawson & McLean, Kenneth L. Lawson and James E. McLean, for relators. Manley, Burke, Fischer & Lipton Co., L.P.A., Timothy M. Burke and Andrew S. Lipton, for respondents Donald Blum, Chief of Police, Mark Reiber, Brian Blum, Scott Whitsken and John Does I through III, Officers of the Lockland Police Force. Joseph T. Deters, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and Philip L. Zorn, Jr., Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for respondent Hamilton County Court of Appeals.

The cause is before the court on respondents’ motions to dismiss. The motions are granted and the cause is dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Douglas, J., dissents. Wright, J., dissents and would grant the writ.
